job.title: Data Scientist - Global Supply Chain
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description:
The Global Supply Chain Operation’s (GSCO) Demand Forecast Data Science Analyst is responsible for providing complex analytics for information across ON Semiconductor. This information is primarily in the areas of Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP) and Demand Management (DM) related processes. These complex analytics should lead directly to efficiencies, improved processes, and improved results across GSCO, and additionally to ON Semiconductor’s Business Units and Sales Organization by virtue or working on S&OP and DM processes.
